text:
BAMTECH | New York | Onsite

BAMTECH is a best-in-class media streaming tech company. We are looking for a fullstack engineer to join the Product Operations Team. ProdOps is currently a smaller team (3 at the moment) so there is plenty of room to learn and grow. If you'd like to work with us and play an essential role in the cord-cutting revolution, please apply here: https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/new-york/full-stack-engin...
